description: After months of video meetings, EU leaders will meet in person to decide how to fund Covid-19 recovery.
title: Coronavirus: Big choices for EU leaders on recovery billions
title_page: Coronavirus: Big choices for EU leaders on recovery billions - BBC News
maintext: One of the eternal truths of political life in Brussels is that expensive spending programmes are more popular with the countries that expect to get money out of them than they are with the countries expected to put it in.
